attributes.action: Call a General Election and dissolve Parliament due to no confidence.
attributes.additional_details:
We demand the immediate Dissolution of Parliament and the calling of a General Election.
​The Government has lost the constitutional mandate to govern due to a severe loss of public confidence. In our democracy, legitimacy rests on the people's support. An election is the vital mechanism for the Crown and Parliament to restore democratic accountability and allow the electorate to choose a stable administration with a clear mandate.
attributes.background:
We call for the Dissolution of Parliament and an immediate General Election.
​The Government has lost the constitutional mandate to govern due to a profound loss of public confidence. A General Election is required to restore democratic accountability via the electorate.
